file_content.text: You. On my doorstep. Fortune has always favored me.
You've all made quite an impression on the galaxy since our last meeting. Congratulations.
You've been busy since our last meeting. Saved Coruscant... Tython. Pity about Uphrades, but you can't win them all.
Imperial Intelligence has kept me appraised of your career since our last meeting. Strange plagues and dark secrets... you lead an interesting life, Jedi.
Since our last meeting, you've become a rising star in the Republic Special Forces. I've read your file. Quite respectable.
I've followed your growing infamy since our last meeting. You've made a name for yourself among the galaxy's mongrels. Congratulations, I suppose.
Sadly, your victories end here. My fleet is about to bombard your position from orbit.
This place is designed to withstand a lot of firepower.
Good thing I'm in a fortress.
The fortress shields have been deactivated. You're standing in a tomb, and I'm burying you in it.
You're being foolish, Kilran. Blind strikes rarely find their target.
That's a hopeless strategy.
I'll make up for inaccuracy with sheer quantity. It served me well on Coruscant.
Are you insane? You'd wipe this fortress off the map just to get revenge?
You'll kill your own people!
My orders are to safeguard the fortress's contents at any cost. I've adopted a liberal interpretation of that command.
Don't be hasty, chief. We can both walk away from this. Name your price.
Let's make a deal.
The only restitution that will satisfy me is your ashes scattered to the wind.
Who the blazes are you? What's got you angry enough to blow up your own fortress?
Have we met before?
Grand Moff Rycus Kilran. We sparred during the Esseles incident. I was hunting the Twi'lek ambassador, Vyn Asara. You interfered.
I've survived worse. Seeing your face, for starters.
Give it your best shot, ugly.
Schoolyard insults? Tsk, I expected better from the Republic's so-called finest.
It's been a pleasure catching up... but you won't escape this time.
It's Oteg. Do you read me? I monitored that transmission. My fleet is moving to intercept the bombardment.
I'll do my best to keep the Grand Moff busy, but you need to hurry. Find that Gree computer and get out of there!
